\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin1]{inputenc}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Bold symbol macro for standard LaTeX users
\newcommand{\boldsymbol}[1]{\mbox{\boldmath $#1$}}


\usepackage{babel}
\makeatother
\begin{document}

\title{Lattice Forces}


\author{C. J. Tymczak}

\maketitle

\section*{Introdution}


\subsection*{Definition:}

Let us start with the definition of the gradient

\[
\mathcal{F}_{\mathbf{ij}}=\frac{\delta E}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=2Tr\left[\mathbf{P\, F\, P\,}\frac{\mathbf{\delta S}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\right]-Tr\left[\mathbf{P\,\frac{\delta\left(T\mathbf{+J+U+\left(1-\alpha\right)K_{xc}+\alpha}K\right)}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}}\right]+\frac{\delta E_{nuc}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\]



\subsection*{The Overlap Term:}

Let us cosider the first term, for the lattice forces

\[
2Tr\left[\mathbf{P\, F\, P\,}\frac{\mathbf{\delta S}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\right]=\sum_{ab}\left(\mathbf{P\, F\, P}\right)_{ab}\frac{\delta S_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\]
where

\begin{eqnarray*}
\frac{\delta S_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}} & = & \frac{\delta\left[\sum_{\mathbf{R}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}\,\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\right]}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\end{eqnarray*}
which we can write as

\[
\frac{\delta S_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=\sum_{\mathbf{R}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}\,\left\{ \frac{\delta\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)+\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\frac{\delta\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}\right\} \]
which equals

\[
\frac{\delta S_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=\sum_{\mathbf{R}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}\,\left\{ \mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)\cdot\frac{d\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{a}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)+\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{d\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)}\right\} \]
where

\[
\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)=\frac{\delta\mathbf{a}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=\mathbf{M^{-1}a}\]



\subsection*{The Kinectic Term:}

Let us now consider each term in the fockian

\[
\frac{\delta T_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=\sum_{\mathbf{R}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}\,\left\{ \mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)\cdot\left\{ \frac{d\mathbf{\bigtriangledown}\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{a}}\mathbf{\cdot\bigtriangledown}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\right\} +\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)\cdot\left\{ \mathbf{\bigtriangledown}\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\cdot\frac{d\mathbf{\bigtriangledown}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{d\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)}\right\} \right\} \]



\subsection*{The Pseudopotential Term:}

\[
\frac{\delta U_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}=2\sum_{c}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}\,\left\{ \mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)\cdot\frac{d\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{a}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)+\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{d\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)}\right\} V_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R'}\right)\]



\subsection*{The Exchange Term:}

\begin{eqnarray*}
\textrm{\frac{\delta K_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}} & = & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{MIC\left(\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)\cdot\frac{d\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{a}}\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{MIC\left(\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{c+R}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\frac{d\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{d\mathbf{c+R}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{MIC\left(\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{b}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)}{d\mathbf{b}}\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{MIC\left(\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{d+R'}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)\frac{d\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)}{d\mathbf{d+R'}}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{R_{MIC}}\right)\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r'}+\mathbf{R_{MIC}}\right)}{d\mathbf{b+R_{MIC}}}\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'+R_{MIC}}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{cd}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{\mathcal{L}}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{R_{MIC}}\right)\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\phi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r'}+\mathbf{R_{MIC}}\right)\frac{d\phi_{d}\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\mathbf{+R_{MIC}}\right)}{d\mathbf{d+R'+R_{MIC}}}}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \end{eqnarray*}



\subsection*{Coulomb Term:}

\begin{eqnarray*}
\sum_{ab}P_{ab}\textrm{\frac{\delta J_{ab}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}+\frac{\delta E_{nuc}}{\delta\mathbf{m_{ij}}}} & = & 2\sum_{ab}P_{ab}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{a}\right)\cdot\frac{d\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{a}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)\rho\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & 2\sum_{ab}P_{ab}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{b+R}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R}\right)}{d\mathbf{b+R}}\rho\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{ab}P_{ab}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{R'}\right)\cdot\frac{d\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r+R'}\right)}{d\mathbf{a+R'}}\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R+R'}\right)\rho\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{ab}P_{ab}\sum_{\mathbf{RR'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\left\{ \frac{\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{R'}\right)\cdot\phi_{a}\left(\mathbf{r+R'}\right)\frac{d\phi_{b}\left(\mathbf{r+R+R'}\right)}{d\mathbf{b+R+R'}}\rho\left(\mathbf{r'}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\right\} \\
 & + & \sum_{c}\sum_{\mathbf{R'}}\int d^{3}\mathbf{r}d^{3}\mathbf{r'}\,\frac{\left(2\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{c}\right)+\mathcal{L}_{ij}\left(\mathbf{R'}\right)\right)\cdot\frac{d\psi_{c}\left(\mathbf{r}\right)}{d\mathbf{c}}\rho\left(\mathbf{r'+R'}\right)}{\left|\mathbf{r-r'}\right|}\end{eqnarray*}

\end{document}
